summary: An Imperial Leather/Studded, Heavy Shield & Helmet Replacer.
descriptionHtml:
Howdy [u][i][b]great[/b][/i][/u] peeps,

Always found that the leather Imperial helmet, heavy shield & leather/studded armors felt out of place,
(And didn't really like any Imperial replacement mods on the Nexus).

So I replaced the leather helmet with the steel look, the heavy shield with the light shield look,
and the leather & studded Imperial armors with a chainmail look (thanks to the courtesy of [b]PROMETHEUS_ts[/b]).

Both Imperial shields will look the same but will have different stats,
it's the same for the Imperial helmet & Imperial light helmet.

I highly recommend to use "[b][i]Better Shaped Weapons[/i][/b]" with it, so swords don't look so broad/wide.

Enjoy.

Kind regards,
Mike
author: WikusVanDerMerwe   PROMETHEUS_ts
